full_text:
Re: Epstein
From Ray Ormond
To Shirley V. Skipper-Scott
Date 2019/07/24 12:17
Subject: Re: Epstein
Attachments: TEXT.htm, Ray Ormond.vcf

Thanks Shirley.

J. Ray Ormond
Regional Director
Northeast Region
215-521
>>> Shirley V. Skipper-Scott 7/24/2019 12:14 PM >>>
Hello,

Epstein is pending a Code 228, Tattooing or Self-Mutilation and I spoke with [redacted] who indicated that most likely he will be found competent because he is not mentally ill.
Therefore, he will be pending a UDC hearing. Should he return to SHU, he will be housed with inmate [redacted] is a 54-year-old White Male. He is a Pretrial inmate on a Supervised Release Violation for Failure to Register as Sex Offender. He is refusing to go to general population.

The other inmates in SHU were reviewed for a possible cell mate, however, inmate [redacted] were determined the appropriate candidates as cell mates. However [redacted] releases on July 26, 2019. He is also the current cell mate of inmate [redacted]

We are still reviewing cases in the general population for a possible cell mate.

If I haven't addressed your questions, please call me and let me know. Thanks.

Shirley Skipper-Scott
Associate Warden
MCC New York
150 Park Row
New York, New York 10007
Office: 646-836 [redacted]
Black Berry: 646-423 [redacted]
[redacted]
>>> Ray Ormond 7/24/2019 10:53 AM >>>
Thanks!!

J. Ray Ormond
Regional Director

Page 618
DOJ-OGR-00027276
